CustomField.description: Required in SpringCM; used to indicate whether there is a Participant Term Minimum number of Months required. If so, users will be required to populate the Participant Term Minimum Months field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Required in SpringCM; used to indicate whether there is a Participant Term Minimum number of Months required. If so, users will be required to populate the Participant Term Minimum Months field.
CustomField.label: Is there a PTMM?
